## Querying rows
```{r}
iris_raw %>% 
  head(10)
iris_raw %>% 
  tail(10)
iris_raw %>% 
  sample_n(10)
iris_raw %>% 
  sample_frac(0.10)
```
WHERE...is true for querying data
```{r}
iris_raw %>% 
  filter(Species=="setosa", Sepal.Length > 5.5)
```

Compound criteria e.g. equal, less than/greater than, not equal
```{r}
TRUE & FALSE
```
```{r}
iris_raw %>% 
  filter_if(is.numeric, any_vars( . < 5))
```
